body:
Comment 4: 
Normally I would agree with you but, in this case I'm not sure. example for centos 5 the
32bit multi-lib headers are actually glibc-devel.i386 not i686.

Where if we keep our requirements generic to glibc headers. People more then likely
would know or can find that information. Which covers all distro's including ones that
may not exist yet.

This does not even take into account non glibc system ie bsd, android etc.
